body_html:
this is an explicit choice we made, to not auto-convert numpy arrays. Because the magical wrapping would essentially do: numpy->Tensor->Variable, a 3 hop magic.

I'll discuss it again with the others but I am not sure our decision will change.

Also, model.forward(x) is not correct, you need to do: model(x).

Otherwise hooks wont work.

Thanks for the suggestion!

body:
this is an explicit choice we made, to not auto-convert numpy arrays. Because the magical wrapping would essentially do: numpy->Tensor->Variable, a 3 hop magic.

I'll discuss it again with the others but I am not sure our decision will change.

Also, `model.forward(x)` is not correct, you need to do: `model(x)`. 

Otherwise hooks wont work.

Thanks for the suggestion!
